about_the_game:
Zeo effect is a tactical-arcade with rogue-lite elements and global map and item accumulation.
Time runs only when you take action.

Extensive arsenal of assault, defensive and auxiliary instruments.


Your run consists of a ramified path, divided into segments which contain at least 3 points to choose from, that differ in duration, difficulty,
type of loot, or special conditions and restrictions for room completion.

Getting hit by an enemy bullet spends a significant amount of drone's energy, which then goes to safe spaces and regenerates upon room completion.



A very valuable resource drops from destroyed enemies - spheres from which you can get additional weapons.

Every enemy possesses an individual behavior pattern
Enemies have blind zones and different alarm activation patterns.
The player can attack head on or sneak to the enemies' blind zones and calmly destroy them.
Some enemies are easier to battle in open spaces, with some it may be wiser to use cover.
Or you can just quickly defeat everybody in your way with smart use of items.

Your primary weapon is pretty powerful and is an effective tool to eliminate enemies. It is permanently at your disposal.
But there is a vast arsenal of tools, weapons and gadgets at your disposal, that will help destroying enemies faster, more effective, more spectacular and a lot more fun.
